pravindra commented on issue #2967: ARROW-3765: [Gandiva] Segfault when the validity bitmap has not been allocated

   sorry, I looked at this a bit late. An additional change is required for the if-else and boolean expression handling where we directly access the validity bitmap. I'll open a jira for that.

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: [Gandiva] Segfault when the validity bitmap has not been allocated

comments.body: Yes, in a number of places we don't allocate a validity bitmap for data without nulls. For large datasets, it would be wasteful to have to create a bitmap with all 1's
